mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.code AS "code", a.sort AS "sort", a.type AS "type", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.del_status AS "delStatus", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", p.name AS "parent.name"
FROM sys_area a LEFT JOIN sys_area p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND a.parent_id = #{parent.id}
WHERE a.del_status = "0"
ORDER BY a.create_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_area( id, name, code, sort, type, remarks, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_status, parent_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{code}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateTime}, #{delStatus}, #{parent.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_area SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, code = #{code}, name = #{name}, sort = #{sort}, type = #{type}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateTime}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
